inclusion.criterion: improvement in back pain with exercise but not with rest
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: awakening because of back pain during the second half of the night only
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative IgE-mediated immune-allergy tests to wheat
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: resolution of the IBS symptoms on standard elimination diet, excluding wheat
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptom reappearance on double-blind placebo-controlled (DBPC) wheat challenge
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: positive EmA in the culture medium of the duodenal biopsies, also in the case of normal villi/crypts ratio in the duodenal mucosa
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain. The pain started last night as diffuse abdominal discomfort.
